title: Bartertown Diner
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: Its American diner fare menu is vegan except the option of add-on cheese, and it changes based on seasonal ingredients. Has raw food, daily specials, gluten-free options. Deli case/drinks available Mon-Fri 9-11am. Eco-friendly interior. As of 2016 it's no longer a worker's collective.
